description: Latest news, judgments, and updates from the Supreme Court of India

news.title: Supreme Court Delivers Landmark Judgment on Environmental Protection
news.content: In a significant judgment, the Supreme Court of India has delivered a landmark ruling on environmental protection, establishing new precedents for future environmental litigation. The court emphasized that the right to a clean and healthy environment is an integral part of the right to life under Article 21 of the Constitution...

news.title: Constitutional Bench Reviews Digital Privacy Rights
news.content: The Supreme Court's constitutional bench is currently reviewing petitions related to digital privacy rights and data protection. The case involves multiple aspects of digital rights including consent mechanisms, data portability, and the right to be forgotten...

news.title: SC Clarifies Procedure for Anticipatory Bail in Economic Offenses
news.content: In a detailed judgment, the Supreme Court has provided clarity on the procedure and considerations for granting anticipatory bail in economic offense cases. The court outlined specific parameters that need to be considered by lower courts...

news.title: Supreme Court Issues Guidelines on Juvenile Justice System
news.content: The Supreme Court has issued detailed guidelines for the effective implementation of the juvenile justice system, focusing on rehabilitation rather than punishment. The guidelines cover various aspects including legal aid, counseling, and reintegration programs...

news.title: Bench Formation for Electoral Reforms Case Announced
news.content: The Chief Justice has announced the formation of a special bench to hear important cases related to electoral reforms. The bench will examine issues related to political party funding, electoral bonds, and transparency in elections...
